mapper.select: select * from tb_survey_option where item_id = #{itemId} and del_flag = '0' order by sort_no asc, id asc

select o.* from tb_survey_option o where exists (select 1 from tb_survey_item i where i.id = o.item_id and i.survey_id = #{surveyId}) and o.del_flag = '0' order by o.item_id asc, o.sort_no asc, o.id asc
mapper.insert: insert into tb_survey_option ( item_id, label, value, sort_no, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, del_flag ) values ( #{itemId}, #{label}, #{value}, #{sortNo}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, '0' )
mapper.delete: delete from tb_survey_option where item_id in (select id from tb_survey_item where survey_id = #{surveyId})
